questions.question: A recursive function must have a ____ case to prevent infinite recursion.
Write a simple recursive function named 'countdown' that takes a number n and prints numbers from n down to 1.
questions.starter_code:
# Write a recursive countdown function
def countdown(n):
    # Add your code here
    pass
questions.sample_solution:
def countdown(n):
    if n <= 0:  # base case
        return
    print(n)
    countdown(n - 1)  # recursive call
